title: "Kill Yourself" - How it actually feels
body:
I am seriously disappointed with the community. Apparently many people that I have played with think that suicide is a totally okay thing: so okay that they wish it on people that may not play their best. Coming from a game where we lost, and I, agree that I did not play my absolute best with a couple wrong calls here and there, was repeatedly told to, quote, "kill yourself." I think that scenarios like this should be dealt with more as it makes the LoL community more toxic than what it should be. The fact that people are wanting people to die over such a small issue perplexes me: so much so that I am starting to lose the pleasure of playing this game, and my faith in the community too.

I hereby ask all players, if you feel the need to yell at someone on the other end of a screen to "kill yourself" stop and think: would you like to be told that? More often than not you would prefer not to kill yourself. Even being told to hurts. So please, for the sake of this community, stop the threats. Especially you hey im baby

^this 

If what some random says to you effects your way of thinking go outside and stay off the internet.

I once said that sentence (for a reason) then I explained that I was referring to the champion within the game not the person in the real life.
You should ask for clarification rather than just taking it as an offense, most of the time misunderstanding lead to these kind of problems.

While it's right to encourage the community to stop typing insults to other guys for no apparent reason,

The "kill yourself" is not the most vile thing you can come across on the net, there are things that are far more sinister and terrible floating on the internet that can jump onto you at any instant.

So 2 things, first the insulters need to realise the utter pointlessness and stupidity of such a action, and secondly, OP you need to buckle up and ignore them.
Pro tip: If you can't handle insults over the internet then maybe you shouldn't be playing ranked.
